channel.description: After i got the crow bar i thought it was weird it didnt show freeman holding it? then i got the pistol and he still isnt holding any weapon, i can still use the weapons but it is really frustrating. Any idea how to fix?

item.title: Problem displaying weapons
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
please ensure that the folder placed into “sourcemods” is named “BMS”:
\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods[b]BMS

[/b]This can help resolve issues with game saves, subtitles, chapter names, and possibly any other issues that may be caused by utilizing the wrong folder name.

Also, do you recall which mirror you downloaded the game from? What will also be helpful would be posting your system specs including the GPU.
